summary: this will make it worth to go around gathering ingreadients
descriptionHtml:
this will make all ingreadients be worth 5 times more than vanilla and if people requests it i can make versions with different rates and this will conflict with any mod that alter weight and value of ingreadients (if u want it i can make it compatiple with my weightless items mod)

If u liked this mod then try looking at some of my other mods :D
